author: Robin Runner
title: Buffalo Tofu Bites [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
text:
February 21, 2017 LIKE OGP ON FACEBOOK : The best part about these buffalo tofu bites is that they are so simple to make. You just pick your favorite vegan hot sauce and the follow the easy steps and you and your friends will be eating tofu wings in no time. Buffalo Tofu Bites [Vegan, Gluten-Free] This Recipe is : 2 tablespoons of vegan butter Olive oil Begin by pressing the water out of your tofu block. Once you’re finished, slice the tofu into cubes or strips. Heat some olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Place the tofu in carefully and brown it on all sides. Remove it and place the tofu on a plate with a paper towel to drain whatever oil is remaining. While the tofu cools, place a small saucepan over a low flame and add your hot sauce and vegan butter. Whisk the mixture until the sauce is blended and heated through. Add the tofu and gently coat/heat through the cubes. EXPLORE MORE VEGAN RECIPES WITH THESE INGREDIENTS
